name: gemini-whatsapp-enhancer
description: Chrome Extension to enhance WhatsApp messages with Google Gemini API

scripts.lint: echo 'Linting JavaScript files...' && find src -name '*.js' -exec node -c {} \;
scripts.validate: npm run lint && echo 'Validating manifest.json...' && cat manifest.json | jq . > /dev/null && echo '✓ All files valid'
scripts.check: npm run validate && echo '✓ Ready for deployment'

author: josefdc
